issueName: Warn about Search index cap when user has requested more than a 1000 results
Avoid migrating config directory when GH_CONFIG_DIR is set
GitHub CLI should check PATH for git.exe *before* it does the whole auth thing
repo create doesn't ask which github host you want to create the new repo on.
Allow gh auth login to overwrite GITHUB_TOKEN
Update permissions error message to be more descriptive
Provide a convenient way to add gh cli as a git credential helper
Setting git_protocol to ssh isn't picked up without logging out and logging back in
